text: aya andagana inne angatama alunu, sirure rasa rekhawan uluppa dakwana, sirura aawaranayata wada anawarana kerena kalu pahathi nana andumak.

ekala sirithakwa pawathi thawakalika ha kondesi sahagatha wiwahayan thahanam kirima,dikkasada ayithiya sthriyatada labadima,sthrinta dawaddak diya yuthu wima,anthima kamaththa magin depala bahara kirimata sima panawima,bharyawakage depala paripalanaya ayatama labadima,kanthawan sathu daruwange bharakarathwa ayithiya yanadi himikam laba dima magin islamaya magin kanthawage ayithin aaraksha kara athi aakarayada ehidi wiramanthri winisuruthuma wadiduratath penwa di atha.

sathya nam ma mage keti jiwitha kalaye ath windina haba sithiwili aan sharli menma emili bayard starda winda thibunaha.dadiwa aadaraya kirima....mano lokaye ibagathe yamin piyawi lokaya pitudakime hakiyawa athin owun dedena ha karata kara sitime hakiyawa matada we.owun ma wanneda ma owun wanneda ebawini.

lalith prasanna puththalama mulika rohalata athulu kara atha.lori rathaya karmika doshayak nisa nathara kara thibu bawath kiyawe.meyata masa dekakata pamana kalin me pradeshayedi dipendar rathayak paren iwathata pana nawika hamuda niladharin dedeneku miya gos thibuni.karuwalagaswawa polisiye sthanadhipathi pradhana polis parikshaka el.bi. aberathna mahathage upadesin parikshana sidu kere.komandar janaka priyanthakomandar janaka priyantha 1991 agosthu masa 15 wana dina shishyabhata niladhariyeku lesa nawika hamudawata ek wu athara nawika ha sagarika widyapitayen siya mulika puhunuwa nima kaleya.in anathuruwa dirgha kalinawa 04 wana wega praharaka yathra balaganayata anuyukthawa sewaya kala mohu thrasthawadaya parajaya kirimehila athi wishishta sewayak itu kala niladhariyeki.nawika awi pilibanda mohu indiyawedi wisheshagnya patamalawa da nawika awi nadaththu kirima pilibanda wisheshagnya patamalawak chinayedi da hadara atha.wasara 22kata aasanna siya sewa kalaya thuladi nawika hamudawa sathu yuda naukawan wishala sankhyawaka anadena niladhariya lesa katayuthu kota athi mohu thrasthawadin samanga pawathi sagarika sangramawaladi wishishta lesa menma abhithawa satan karamin sathuru yathra wishala pramanayak winasha kirimata srujuwama dayaka wu niladhariyeki.luthinan komandar charith kaluthanthrigeluthinan komandar charith kaluthanthrige 2002 juni 12 wana dina 36 wana bandawa ganime shishyabhata niladhariyeku lesa nawika hamudawata ek wu athara nawika ha sagarika widyapitayen siya mulika puhunuwa nima kaleya.in anathuruwa ohu 2010 wasaredi kanishta nawika mandalika patamalawa sarthakawa hadara atha.luthinan komandar charith kaluthanthrige miya yana wita uthurumada nawika pedesata ayath nawika nauka shiksha aayathanaye godabim satan puhunu pasalata anuyukthawa rajakari karana di.mohu manushika meheyum pawathi kalaye di rata jathiya wenuwen kala amila sewaya agayanu was uthuru ha nangenahira manushiya sewa padakkam walin pidum laba atha..

dan kattiya meka kiyawala hithanna epa riyaliti wala thiyenne narakamayi kiyala.aththatama hangichcha dakshayo godak me wage riyaliti wadasatahan walin api dakinawa.ithin me wadasatahan honda idak arandenawa ehema dakshayinta tharangaya dinuwe nathath thamangema nirmana walin mokakhari ananyathawayak adala kshethraya thula hadaganna.ehema thathwayak hadagaththa ayath innawa.ee hinda dinuwe nathath sahabhagi wima wadagath kiyana eka methanadith apita pahadili wenawa.kalawa kiyana eka athule kapilla ehema godak dakinnata labenawa.ithin me wadasatahan walata idiripathwena ayata thamun ekka tharanga karana aya okkoma ekka hondin aashraya karanna oonetharam ida thiyanawa.ee awasthawen prayojana aran hamoma ekka sahayogen wada karanna,jaya paraduma eka wage windaganna puruduwenna wage godak dewal ape tharangakaruwanta igenaganna puluwan.
